ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of chicken soup
1 (13 ounce) package flavored tortilla snack chips (such as Doritos®), crushed
8 slices processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®)

cookingTips: Brown ground beef thoroughly and drain fat before combining with sauce
Reserve some crushed chips to top casserole for texture contrast
Bake at 350°F for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and cheese is melted
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This comfort food casserole is quick and crowd-pleasing. Will you add sour cream or jalapeños for extra flavor?
